channel.title: Comments on: Tips for Dealing with Email Overload

item.title: By: Leslie Kleinberg
item.dc:creator: Leslie Kleinberg
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2012/05/02/tips-for-dealing-with-email-overload/#comment-17">Sean Mcclelland</a>.
Thanks. In fact, staff may also want to take a look at the UCSF Communicators Resources page -- it's a collection of useful links including UCSF branding info and design standards, tips on taking a good portrait, image resources, email etiquette, etc.
http://communicators.ucsf.edu/resources/
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Sean Mcclelland.

Thanks. In fact, staff may also want to take a look at the UCSF Communicators Resources page — it’s a collection of useful links including UCSF branding info and design standards, tips on taking a good portrait, image resources, email etiquette, etc.

http://communicators.ucsf.edu/resources/
